text: Luigi Serafini (17 June 1951 â€“ 23 August 2020) was an Italian basketball player. He was part of the Italian teams that won a bronze medal at the 1971 European championships and finished fourth in 1977. He competed at the 1972 and 1976 Olympics. He was born in Formigine, Italy. Serafini died on 23 August 2020, aged 69.Il basket piange Luigi Serafini, centro della Virtus di Peterson e della Nazionale ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Italian basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Emilia-Romagna
title: Luigi Serafini (basketball)
